channel.title: Researches on Rocío Sepúlveda-Manzo
channel.description: Recent content in Researches on Rocío Sepúlveda-Manzo

item.title: Research
item.description:
• H. Pasten, R. Sepúlveda-Manzo, On the $abc$ and the $abcd$ conjectures. Preprint (2024) (Bull Braz Math Soc, New Series 56, 54 (2025).)

  • My Master’s thesis is titled “On the finite rank problem of the Mordell–Weil group”. A journal article based on this thesis is currently in preparation.

  • My Undergraduate’s thesis is titled “Valores de la función dseta de Riemann” (en español). In this work I studied Beukers’ proof of the irrationality of $\zeta(3)$ using integral methods.
item.content:encoded:
• H. Pasten, R. Sepúlveda-Manzo, On the $abc$ and the $abcd$ conjectures. Preprint (2024) (Bull Braz Math Soc, New Series 56, 54 (2025).)

  • My Master’s thesis is titled “On the finite rank problem of the Mordell–Weil group”. A journal article based on this thesis is currently in preparation.

  • My Undergraduate’s thesis is titled “Valores de la función dseta de Riemann” (en español). In this work I studied Beukers’ proof of the irrationality of $\zeta(3)$ using integral methods.
